title: Get Playlist by ID
name: Get_Playlists_by_ID
description: Gets a playlist object for the account

Response Field.description: the playlist type: EXPLICIT or smart playlist type
search string to retrieve the videos (smart playlists only)

Response Fields.description: time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
whether video is force-stopped at the cue point
URL for the default poster source image
URL for the default thumbnail source image
video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
map of key/value pairs for ad requests

400: sort parameter specified and invalid field

title: Get Playlist by Reference ID
name: Get_Playlists_by_Reference_ID
description: Gets a playlist object for the account

Response Field.description: the playlist type: EXPLICIT or smart playlist type
search string to retrieve the videos (smart playlists only)

Response Fields.description: time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
whether video is force-stopped at the cue point
URL for the default poster source image
URL for the default thumbnail source image
video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
map of key/value pairs for ad requests

title: Get Video by ID
name: Get_Video_by_ID
description: Gets a video object by video id

Header.description: : application/json;pk=policy_key (there are 3 ways to authenticate use one of these three headers) See Policy API Overview or Policy Keys for information on getting policy keys
: BCOV-Policy {policy_key} (there are 3 ways to authenticate use one of these three headers) See Policy API Overview or Policy Keys for information on getting policy keys
: {policy_key} (there are 3 ways to authenticate use one of these three headers) See Policy API Overview or Policy Keys for information on getting policy keys

Response Fields.description: time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
whether video is force-stopped at the cue point
URL for the default poster source image
URL for the default thumbnail source image
video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
map of key/value pairs for ad requests

title: Get Video by Reference ID

Header.description: Authorization: application/json;pk=policy_key See Policy API Overview or Policy Keys for information on getting policy keys

map of key/value pairs for ad requests
